newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romania 91-day T-bill issue fully subscribed.
newsitem.headline: Romania 91-day T-bill issue fully subscribed.

text.p: An issue worth 130 billion lei of Romanian Finance Ministry three-month treasury bills was fully subcribed on Friday, the central bank (BNR) said.

Seven banks -- Casa de Economii si Consemnatiuni, Banca Romana pentru Dezvoltare SA, Banc Post SA, Eximbank SA, Banca Comerciala Romana SA, ABN Amro Romania SA and Robank SA -- and their corporate clients had bought the papers.
The bills, which mature on June 20, offer an annual yield calculated at the average of the auctioned rates on the BNR's one-week funds. The auctioned rate is now 220.02 percent.
